snippet: A book that enables you to comprehend the cocktail long before you reach for a shaker, and primes you to mix a fine drink once you do.
abstract: Sam Bompas and Harry Parr's new book Cocktails With Bompas & Parr enables you to comprehend the cocktail long before you reach for a shaker, and primes you to mix a fine drink once you do.
lead_paragraph: A book that enables you to comprehend the cocktail long before you reach for a shaker, and primes you to mix a fine drink once you do.

headline.seo: A Sensible Guide to Cocktails - Food Stuff
headline.main: An Offbeat Guide to Confident Cocktails
headline.print_headline: An Offbeat Guide To Confident Cocktails
